name: Crop Yield Prediction
desc: An AI-powered web application that predicts crop yields based on soil data, weather conditions, and historical trends. Built using Python, Flask, and machine learning models.

name: AI Powered Chatbot
desc: A conversational AI chatbot for customer support, integrated with natural language processing. Developed using Node.js, Express, and Dialogflow API.

name: Smart Finance Dashboard
desc: A comprehensive financial dashboard for tracking expenses, investments, and budgets. Features real-time data visualization and predictive analytics. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

name: IncomeTax Calculator
desc: A user-friendly and optimized Income Tax Calculator web application that accurately computes tax liabilities based on income slabs, deductions, exemptions, and tax regimes. Features interactive forms, real-time calculations, and detailed breakdowns for better financial planning. Built with modern web technologies for seamless performance and responsive design.
